comments:
In 3.0.1RC2...

I have a particular launch config that when I open it I get a NPE as shown 
below.  I don't have alot more info other than I may have had at one point a 
plugin with no plugin.xml file (just a manifest.mf).

Hmmm, after more investigation I see that in the Plugins tab under workspace 
plugins there is one entry that has a check box but no label/version (it is 
just blank). Interestingly though, all the workspace plugins are shown with 
labels.  So this blank one is somehow not really there!  Given the ordering it 
it may represent org.eclipse.swt as I have an SWT fragment in the workspace but 
not org.eclipse.swt itself.

Note also that this happens even if I create a new launch configuration and 
select "choose plugins and fragments to launch".  In fact, it happens whenever 
I open the launch config dialog.  I just can't seem to get rid of it.

The launch config still seems to work...

code has changed as a result of the JAR'ed bundle support in 3.1M3.
As a side effect, this problem is no longer an issue.
